para.text: Company certificates are issued to organisations that wish to sign data or applets using

. Although the company certificates do not contain direct contact details, such as e-mail and postal addresses, this information is held on file by the CA so that it may be used in cases where it becomes necessary to contact the organisation for some reason. In cases where abuse of the certificate is reported, the certificate will be revoked.
